tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE feedback_survey (
  survey_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  student_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  rating INT,
  survey_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE SurveyResponses (
    response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    survey_id INT,
    response_text TEXT,
    response_date TIMESTAMP
);
CREATE TABLE students (student_id INT, name VARCHAR(255), email VARCHAR(255), major VARCHAR(255));
CREATE TABLE surveys (survey_id INT, topic VARCHAR(255), start_date DATE, end_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE responses (response_id INT, survey_id INT, student_id INT, rating INT, feedback TEXT);
CREATE TABLE evaluations (evaluation_id INT, survey_id INT, student_id INT, question VARCHAR(255), answer TEXT);
